name: Dani´s Ultimate Milk Clicker
description:
This is a Little Game About Dani and his Milk :)

News:

-Cow works now

-Fixed You cant click the mute button

-The Buy Button is now fixed

-Athor random Things were added(Coming soon!)

Better Shop now!(its a Little bit bugi, yet.)

New Finger

-Diamond Finger

-Added Particals in the Background

-fixed You cant pause the music

Added first Upgrades:

Fingers - you can buy them to make more milk per click

New Feature - now you see in the shop how much milk you have :)

Art from : TheRockGuy

Other Cool Dude: motovec

Play Tester: TheRockGuy, motovec, Kreiseljustus and hopefully Dani!
